Actions.Name: Create a new agent
Actions.Description: This operation is used to add a new agent to your LiveChat account.

Actions.Name: Create a new ticket
Actions.Description: This operation is used to add a new ticket to your LiveChat account.

Actions.Name: Remove an agent
Actions.Description: This operation is used to delete an agent from your LiveChat account.

Actions.Name: Get ticket
Actions.Description: This operation is used to fetch the details of a specific ticket in your LiveChat account.

Actions.Name: List agents
Actions.Description: This operation returns a list of all the agents in your LiveChat account.

Actions.Name: List tickets
Actions.Description: This operation returns a list of tickets in your LiveChat account.

Actions.Name: Update ticket
Actions.Description: This operation is used to update the details of an existing ticket in your LiveChat account.

Actions.Name: When a chat ends
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a chat ends.

Actions.Name: When a chat starts
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when new a chat starts.

Actions.Name: When a ticket is created
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new ticket is added.
